document.full_text: yemen's opposition rejected an offer on thursday to join saudi-mediated talks on a transfer of power and set a two-week deadline for president ali abdullah saleh to step aside.
document.title: yemen opposition wants saleh out within two weeks
lines_and_colors: yemen's opposition rejected an offer on thursday to join saudi-mediated talks on a transfer of power and set a two-week deadline for president ali abdullah saleh to step aside.
